info.name: backend project
info.description:
web shop api

used variables:

variables:

base_url

request.description:
creating an admin

code 200:

example response:

{ "id": 24, "email": "[admin@gmx.at](mailto:admin@gmx.at)"}

500: admin could not be created

403: Admin with this email already exists'

login for an admin

200

response: token, userId and email

500: several messages

update products

200

response : updated product

500: Update Product failed

delete products by id

200

response: marked as deleted

500: Cannot delete products

body.raw:
{
    "stock": "10",
    "name": "Yamaha CGS 104A NT 4/4 Natural",
    "price": "159.00",
    "description": "Gerade jugendliche Einsteiger, aber auch erfahrenere Spieler werden die kraftvolle Performance der CGS104 zu schätzen wissen",
    "categorgyId": 2
}

request.description:
add products to the database

200

response: Product created successfully

400: Bad request

Order overview for admins, newest orders first

200

response:if a guest has placed an order, guest data will be included if a registered user has placed an order, the user data will be included

500: error overview could not be loaded

update order status

false = 0/ processing , true = 1/shipped

200

response: { 1 }

500: order id not found

a list of signed users

200

response: signed users

401: unauthorized

Find a user by id

200: user data

404: User Id not found
das geht nicht

item.name: user

request.description:
order by a authenticated user

201

response: order successful

400: Out of stock

500\. order error occured

login a signed user

200

response: token and user

403: email or password is incorrect

register a new user

200

response: success

401: register failed

order overview of a logged in user

200

response: all orders a user have placed

500: error

response.name: orders 200

request.description: geht auch noch nicht....zu testzwecken

item.description: Register,login, order, order overview for users

item.name: products

request.description:
Overview of all products with name and price

200: response: products name and price

500: internal Server Error

products sorted by name and or price

200

response: products sorted by name or price descending and ascending

500: an unexpected error occured

request.description:
search products by string

200

response: name, price and description of products

500: an unexpected error occurred

view product details by product id,

200

response: product

404: Product not found

item.description: view all products, sort and order products and get the product details, for user and guest

request.description:
place order without authentication, give email,firstname,lastname instead

200: order successful

400: out of stock

500: all fields must be completed
